sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move the project_manager, project_user, project_portfolio_user to it_project_manager, it_project_user, it_project_portfolio_user role</description>
        <name>Migrate Project Management Roles</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var itProjectManager = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('it_project_manager');
var itProjectUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('it_project_user');
var projectManager = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('project_manager');
var projectUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('project_user');
var itProjectPortfolioUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('it_project_portfolio_user');
var projectPortfolioUser = PPMRoleFix.findRoleId('project_portfolio_user');

var wf = session.setWorkflow(true);  // turn workflow on

remapRole(projectManager, itProjectManager);
remapRole(projectUser, itProjectUser);
remapRole(projectPortfolioUser, itProjectPortfolioUser);

session.setWorkflow(wf);

function remapRole(fromRole, toRole) {
    new PPMRoleFix().remapRole(fromRole, toRole);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-03-19 16:38:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9981cc573732310033cb26877e41f18e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Migrate Project Management Roles</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9981cc573732310033cb26877e41f18e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-01-13 00:44:46</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
